betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Welcome to your fun greg journey.
The early game of this modpack will drag, thats a fun word through botania to produce ores using magic before greg.
Craft some Floral Fertilizer from them Living Roots, You will need this to progress more in Botania.
Chop a tree. If you find that a tree doesn't grow instantly pressing the shift key quickly with make a tree grow faster.
Now you have Floral Fertilizer you can click it on the dirt platform you have (I Hope you do) to produce Mystical Flowers. For this quest I task you with collecting 2 Mystical White Flowers.
The Pure daisy is essential to get closer to making your first ores.
To produce your first mana you need an Endoflame Flower from botania, It can run on any furnace fuel you want. The fuel you can use Is a trade secret but i'm sure you can figure it out :)
So to get cobblestone in this, before you get lava is to hold your shift key and click with your right mouse button (Keybinds may vary). This in tern will give you pebbles.

Now you have cobblestone and mystical flowers you can now craft a Petal Apothecary.
I suggest you keep at least 1 seed from this quest so you can plant more.

betterquesting:10.name:8: Its Alive, I mean, 96% well done Jesse.
betterquesting:10.desc:8: Now you have a pure daisy you can now make living rock and living wood.
What!?! Your surprized this recipe is not somthing crazy. Now that sounds increadibly silly :)
To actually Fill your Petal Apothecary you will need water. to get water for now you need cyan and blue powder mixed with a bowl. yes you can use that to fill the Petal Apothecary.

Mana Spreader: Extracts mana from mana generating flowers.
Mana Pool: Stores Mana for later use, Aim Mana Spreader at teh Mana Pool.
Wand of the Forest: Needed to rotate Mana Spreader and bind Flowers to Spreaders.
You have made it this far, Well done. You now need to craft an orchid to start generating ores. Ill give you a pickaxe to mine the ores but i suggest making one for the future :)
You can now Collect ores! To make Mana Steel you will need to collect some Copper and Tin Ore for Bronze and make a Mortar to grind Ingots into dusts.
Stone is needed to produce ores with the Orechid, Hense the need for a furnace.
Bronze is going to be used a lot in this chapter. I hope you can generate ores quickly enough.
Now you can make your first set of tools. Flint will have to do, Later on you will get some better materials to make tools out of :D
This Mortar is the next step in progression. required for large amounts of bronze and to craft your very first tools.
By Placing Cobblestone next to the Pure Daisy, You can produce gravel. Gravel will be used to make your first mortar.
You can't actually automate ores just yet. You will be able to automate ores once you get some steam machines. Probably the first thing you should do.
All the other ores you can produce from the orchid can be found in jei.
The Forge Hammer can create plates at a ratio of 1.5 ingots to 1 plate instead of 2 ingots to 1 plate.
The Compressor will be used to make certain Plates from Dusts and more importently produce Firebricks From Firebrick Dust.
The Steam Alloy Smelter lets you combine metals Like Tin and Copper to produce Bronze. It can also be used to make other materials like Rubber and Iron
The Extrator will be your gateway into producing Rubber from Slimonds or Sticky Resin.
If you craft some Coarse Dirt and drop it into a Mana Pool with a bit of mana, It will give you dirt. Infinite Dirt anyone?
With The macerator you can now produce double the ore output. In my opinion this is essental for you since ores come from the Orchid.
Steam Furnace allows you to smelt things for Steam instead of furnace fuels.
This Type of Bronze Hull will be used for early Steam Production and 2 Steam Machines: Alloy Smelter and Steam Furnace.
Clay is produced by throwing Stone Dust in a Mana Pool.
Bricks are made using a Wooden Form and clay, I know it's that simple. One slight snag is that laying bricks is hard, don't expect the bowl of water not to break.
Now you have an unlimited supply of dirt, you should probably make a farm with it. craft a flint hoe from gt and place the farm next to the water source you have on your island.
Not really a good way to produce Steam. Sure they produce more than Solid or Solar but require lava which you can't produce just yet.
Steam Solar Boilers can't be made yet. They produce steam using the power of the Sun!
This is the first boiler you can use. Don't forget to keep if full or it will explode :D
To transport steam this early on you'll have to use bronze fluid pipes. make sure you connect the fluid pipes to the target container with a gregtech wrench.
The Rain collector is the only way to get water at this point in the game. It will slowly accumulate water store in its internal tank. Might want a tank to store water.
Now with the clay you have produced. You can now make a clay bucket and transport water source blocks anywhere you like.

Water isn't infinite in this anywhere, not even river biomes so try not to remove the only block of water before you get a Rain Collector. If you do somehow remove your only block of water here Ill give you a new one. Can only be claimed once every 30 minutes.
Sand can now be obtained through the Forge hammer you have.
The ULV Robot Arm is Just a Glorified Conveyer. It allows you to limit the amount of items stored in a container.
The ULV Piston is a crafting component used for the ULV Robot Arm
ULV Motor Used for ULV Tier Components.
Any Gregtech pump will allow you to pump fluids outs of tanks into pipes or vise versa. the ULV Pump is a good starting point for fluid transport before LV.
You may have noticed that you can't just smelt Iron ore in a furnace. Instead you will need to smelt it in the Alloysmelter. Any ore will do, check jei for all the recipes.
Now you have a Alloy Smelter its time to make some Charcoal. To do so you will need to build a multiblock, The coke oven.
Red Alloy Ingots are made by Alloy Smelting 4 Redstone dust with 1 Copper ingot.
Using the Iron you now have, you can now make a Bucket. You Need this to make Concrete.
Many things you will need to begin Gregtech include some tools. Now you have Bronze you can make them!
The Basic Ingot Mold is going to be used to make ingots like Iron, Silver.
Gold is used for many things but the main thing is crafting a Basic Ingot Mold. You will need 8 ores to do this.
Steel is made in this monster, The Primative Blast Furnace. You actually need 36 Firebricks for the multiblock.
ULV Conveyers can be placed on any Gregtech machine, Item Pipe or Crate to transport items in/out of them. really usful early on.
Grinding ores too slow. Well look no further than the Steam Grinder.This multiblock processes 8 Items at onces. Now thats a lot of ores.
Now you have Steel from you PBF, Raw Rubber Dust from Slimonds/Sticky Resin and have Sulfer from the Orchid, Combining them all will result in producing Rubber. Your gateway to Low Voltage Has begun.
Steel is used for low voltage machine hulls and components. I hope your making a lot of this because you'll need it.

To automate the Orechid is actually quite simple with these machines. Scanner needs to be set to only filter stone blocks. Redstone torch on the scanner going to the Miner on a corner and the Mechanical user needs to be set to place blocks (stone) and your done. now go afk and get loads of ores.
Glass is made in the Alloy Smelter with a Block Mold and Glass dust. Glass Tubes are made in the Alloy Smelter with a Ball Mold and Glass dust.
Vacuum Tube are the first tier Circuit at ULV Tier.
Red Alloy wires are a lossless energy wire at ULV Voltage. They are also used for your First LV Tier Circuit and automating the Orechid.

Simplest way to automate Mana Production is to place an Open Crate facing down to drop the fuel onto a pressure plate. Control a hopper on top to lock the hopper and your done. does waste an item every 5 minutes but your burning wood planks aren't you?
Circuit Boards are where you will place all the components to make a Electronic Circuit. They require some Sticky Resin and Wood Planks.
Fun jokes aside the Resistor is a crafting component used to make the Electronic Circuit.
Now you have the first of literally hundreds of these. Better start crafting more :D Electronic Circuits are a gateway Component to all the LV Machines and the Electric Blast Furnace.
Sugarcane can be crafted by droping a Hay Bale into the Manapool with some Mana. I hope you have a farm setup for wheat and I sugest setting up a farm for Sugar Cane.
Paper is now unlocked. You can now craft resistors and books.
To get Sticky Resin you start with Slimond dust and compress it into a Slimond. Next you smelt the Slimond in an Alloy Smelter with a Ball Mold to produce Sticky Resin.
This multiblock allows you to smelt 8 items at a time. Really good for smelting 1000+ items at once.
You have Steel, Rubber, Cables and ores. Now its time to start making some LV machines, start with crafting a LV Machine Hull.

You remember the ULV Components from the previous chapter? well all tiers of machines use different components based on the voltage tier. keep that in mind and check jei for the recipes if you get stuck.
The only way to generate power this early is through Steam. Steam Turbines will produce 1a at 32 Volts.

No Description
No Description

Battery Buffers have 4 tiers, 1, 4, 8 and 16 amps. 
Think of amps like this, Amps are how many machines can be running at the same time. 
more amps means more machines running.
be careful tho because your cables alsso have to be able to carry enough amps your outputing.
lastly don't plug an MV cable into an LV cable, The cable will burn or if you plug an MV cable into a machine Boom!
No Description
In the Beginning?
An introduction to Greg Tech Steam Machines.
This chapter you will start to produce energy and begin mining your first ores.
